name: We Didn't Stop The Violence
description:
Rebel: WASD to Move, E to Aim Up, C to Aim Down, F to Fire

OR Controller 1: Left Stick to Move, Right Stick to Aim, RT to Fire

Cop: OKL; to Move, I to Aim Up, M to Aim Down, J to Fire

OR Controller 2: Left Stick to Move, Right Stick to Aim, RT to Fire
